reviewText: Loved this movie as a child now 30 years later I get to let my son enjoy it. Received video way early than estimated delivery was very pleased with my purchased and the seller description was right the video still plays
LOVED IT!!! Such a great childhood memory of every Saturday morning before cartoons came on. Lost my own personal VHS and was so fortunate to finally find this after several years of searching. :)

Wow this video was something my sisters and I watched while growing up. Brings back such great memories and back to a time when things were simpler and less corrupted. Buy this for your kids people and let them enjoy some great songs and dancing.

OMG.. My sister and I LOVED this tape. We had it since we were very very young, I want to guess around 4. We watched it for years, just for fun (it brought back memories). I think I last watched it at 17 or 18 haha, but then the VCR ruined the tape. LOVED THIS FILM, I will probably buy it again, since I see it still exists.

I remember every time I went to visit my grandmother, I insisted on watching this show. I loved it very much. In fact, I loved it so much, my grandmother ended up giving it to me when I was in high school. I began working at a daycare and brought the vhs with me. The children loved it, especially the kindergarteners. The cover became lost quickly. The vhs disappeared a few years later. I am hoping to find a good copy here now that I have my first child. I would like my children to enjoy the music and fun Captain E. Magination brings as I did when I was young.
--jennifer 26 years old
